name: Ricochet: Retro Space Shooter
description:
"Pretty innovative idea. Great presentation on the visuals. Looks like a very cool game" Jerrel Dulay , TouchArcade Beta Tester

Ricochet is an exciting physics shooter wrapped in a beautiful retro package.
Defeating enemies requires bouncing shots of the sides of your device to get the perfect angle to defeat their shields.

Ricochet offers a modern twist on the classic well known genres: fast-paced space arcade action with physics gameplay.
No irritating IAPs , or mindless grinding, this game has been built by gamers that love arcade action!

If you loved retro classics like Asteroids and Galaga , you will love our game!
"The gameplay is a lot of fun and a nice spin on Space Invaders." Leo Kerr,Beta Tester
"I beta tested Ricochet and it was fun!" UnDead Cow, Beta Tester

Defeating enemies requires bouncing shots of the sides of your device to get the perfect angle to defeat their shields.

Waves of enemies attacking in different formations are broken up by boss attacks , each boss having a unique behaviour
requiring some real strategy and tactics to defeat them.You have 8 bases to defend and your enemy is relentless.
Unlock power-ups such as guided missiles, nukes ,lasers and shotgun blast to kill all the bosses and win the game.
